Action.label: 先安装低版本（如4.9u5），打开Tasker确认2次后进入主界面，导入此任务并手动运行，闪退后安装高版本即可。
Action.Str: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8' standalone='yes' ?> <map> <boolean name="PREF_HAS_COMPLETED_INITIAL_TODO" value="true" /> <boolean name="USER_HAS_ACCEPTED_PROMINENT_DISCLAIMER" value="true" /> <boolean name="USER_HAS_CHOSE_TASKY_OR_TASKER_TEST" value="true" /> <boolean name="dscl" value="true" /> <boolean name="ipnu" value="true" /> </map>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8' standalone='yes' ?> <map> <boolean name="IS_USING_TASKY" value="false" /> <boolean name="PREF_ADVANCED_EXPORT_DESCRIPTION" value="false" /> <boolean name="PREF_ALLOW_INSECURE_TASK_RUN_REQUESTS" value="false" /> <boolean name="PREF_ASK_FOR_PERMISSIONS_ON_APP_EXIT" value="true" /> <boolean name="PREF_EXPORT_LIGHT" value="false" /> <boolean name="PREF_IS_USING_TEST_SERVER" value="false" /> <boolean name="PREF_START_MONITOR_ON_APP_OPEN" value="false" /> <boolean name="PREF_USE_2024_TASKER" value="false" /> <boolean name="sHapt" value="false" /> <int name="dragModeNew" value="0" /> <boolean name="tpEn" value="false" /> </map>
